Configuration¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.configuration.Configuration¶
correct_config()¶
determine_basedir(basedir)¶
fill_basedir()¶
Fill basedir with configuration files. Do this even if basedir already exists, because we might have added new files since the last version.
initialise(basedir=None)¶
Typical initialisation sequence. Custom applications can modify this as needed.
load()¶
load_user_config()¶
migrate_basedir(old, new)¶
save()¶
set_defaults()¶
Fill the config with default values. Is called after every load, since a new version of Mnemosyne might have introduced new keys.
